reviews.text: The place is ample and works round the clock, with lots of food choices at reasonable prices. The quality and flavor is actually quite good, and the service is reasonably fast. My only suggestion is too work on the way the food is presented - it looks dreadful and it's a pity because it's much better than the presentation would suggest

I have to say was really shocked, how bad pizza it was.... My friend bought pizza grab and go for 3,5 BGN on the street and seems better that this big one for 21 BGN i had... I ordered big but the plate was smaller than the pizza and taste like cake, the dough is not good. The quality is like fast food, not restaurant. The pizza was burned. I can do at home better pizza - see my pictures attached -  than this one and put also my picture to see the difference. I wish to all of them good business but i was unsatisfied and will never come again. Pls show my picture also the cooker and explain him do not use form for pizza. Nice day

Pizza was good.
It's quite good for a 24/7 restaurant. Surprisingly good.

A large restaurant with good outdoor sittings. We had dinner here on Saturday around 10pm, it was not busy. Service was very good & server speaks English, English menu available. food was good - Tender roasted Veal, beef tenderloin with porcini. They accept credit card.

It was a good dinner choice. Located on an avenue full of options, look for the one that seemed to be the best cost benefit. And it was. My main criterion was to find a place where people did not smoke inside the environment and I managed to find Ugo. The menu is vast and explains well the options in English, in addition to highlighting those that are vegetarian - which makes the tourist’s life much easier. I ordered a vegetarian dish, very tasty, and a pizza. We were well attended and the space is quite large. I’d be back.
